body: Some errors need to be non-retryable in sessions, for example heartbeat failures and panics that bring down the worker shouldn't be retried because the worker's state will have been lost. It appears cadence supports this in retry policy settings for sessions but we don't. More context on our internal slack here: https://temporaltechnologies.slack.com/archives/C01FG4BRQVB/p1620110340297700
title: Non-retryable errors in sessions
